timeline.bodyText:
@liweinan, originally you had
resteasy-jboss-modules-4.6.0-SNAPSHOT-mavenized.zip
resteasy-jboss-modules-4.6.0-SNAPSHOT.zip

right? Alessio gave me a script that changes the version in all of the files, so we can do, for example, 4.6.0-SNAPSHOT -> 4.6.0.Final easily. Mostly that's for changing the pom.xml files, but it will also change the docbook files. So it's safe to use 4.6.0-SNAPSHOT because it will get changed to 4.6.0.Final before the release. And, then, eventually, it will get changed to 4.6.1.Final or whatever, and so on.
